speaker: Village Reborn
line: The same streets. Different posture. People walk like they expect to keep existing tomorrow. It’s a fragile kind of courage.

speaker: Trainee Mara
line: You’ve been out there. You’ve seen the Hollow and came back with your spine intact. Teach me—teach us—before the next night takes someone.

choices.text: Train them. Start with discipline, not heroics.

speaker: Trainee Mara
line: We learned how to panic quietly. We learned which doors hold. We learned that waiting for rescue is just another kind of prayer.

speaker: Village Reborn
line: A few nods. A few steady breaths. The kind of progress you can’t celebrate without tempting fate—so you simply keep going.
